feed.title: 4ga Boards Releases

entry.title: New release for 4ga Boards: 4ga Boards 3.1.9
entry.content:
Changes since last release: - ğŸŒŸ feat: Added dockerfile healthcheck 827ce77 - ğŸ fix: Dockerfile healthcheck - changed curl to wget as it is available by default 18cc483 - ğŸŒŸ feat: Preparing for switch to the latest socket.io-client 8f06dca - ğŸ fix: Socket connection fixes 546dc88 - ğŸ refactor: sails.io.js f8467b5 - ğŸ’„ chore(deps): Bump socket.io-client from 2.5.0 to 4.8.1 97d1209 - ğŸ fix: Fixed reconnect, reconnect_attempt events for sockets fb11f3f - ğŸŒŸ feat: Removed strict checking for warnings before commit 835ce08 - ğŸ fix: Fixed socket error checking 5e6b13a - ğŸŒŸ feat: Added support for socket manager events, added reconnect event a50a1b6 - ğŸ fix: Use new sails io client b6daf35 - ğŸ fix: Don't send extra @entry/CURRENT_USER_FILTER_QUERY_UPDATE always at load 9f05cab - ğŸ fix: updateCoreSettings using sockets 5c2f151 - ğŸ’Š clean: Formatted comments and console.logs in sails.io.js 6e1d3ac - ğŸ’Š clean: Removed logger prefix fa36e08 - ğŸ’Š clean: Removed config via html attributes 3e20276 - ğŸ fix: Simplified socket requests logic ed41f8a - ğŸŒŸ feat: Added "(You)" to the current user in UsersSettings de6dd2e - ğŸ’„ chore(deps-dev): Bump chai from 5.1.2 to 5.2.0 in /server 81a67ca - ğŸ’„ chore(deps-dev): Bump mocha from 11.0.1 to 11.1.0 in /server bb90a30 - ğŸ“„ Merge pull request #490 from RARgames/dependabot/npm_and_yarn/server/mocha-11.1.0 0a82da9 - ğŸ’„ chore(deps): Bump i18next-browser-languagedetector to 8.0.4, react-datepicker to 8.1.0 6dac750 - ğŸ’„ chore(deps): Bump react-photoswipe-gallery, react-router, react-textarea-autosize, remark-gfm d649f4a - ğŸ’„ chore(deps): Bump reselect, sass, sass-loader, semver, Removed: sails.io.js d335182 - ğŸŒŸ feat: Removed tailwind 7d1c252 - ğŸ’„ chore(deps): Bump dotenv-expand, fs-extra, postcss, postcss-preset-env 05ac5a6 - ğŸ’„ chore(deps): Bump dotenv, @testing-library/react, @testing-library/user-event, eslint-plugin-react, eslint-plugin-react-hooks, Removed: react-test-renderer 9a7128a - ğŸ’¢ ci: Updated some eslint rules ea97be8 - ğŸŒŸ feat: Added REQUIRED_PASSWORD_STRENGTH to client Config 170f15b - ğŸ’„ chore(deps): Bump uuid to 11.1.0 a895eea - ğŸ fix: Fixed bug - project manager without boardMembership 118a8d1 - ğŸŒŸ feat: Added state restore for boardMembership delete failure ca3f8ce - ğŸŒŸ feat: Prevent boardMembership delete when projectManager want to remove himself from managedBoard 9ab278a - ğŸ fix: Added missing projectManagers - boardMemberships 0cac538 - ğŸ fix: Fully disabled removing projectManager from board 0cac53 2b1635f - ğŸŒŸ feat: Added Label, Labels icons e2b9976 - ğŸ fix: Corrected labels ordering 9b1f686 - ğŸŒŸ feat: Added clear filters buttons, Added indicators when hovering to remove filter item 753a0a3 - ğŸŒŸ feat: Added more advanced card filtering options p1 cc60bb7 - ğŸŒŸ feat: Added more advanced card filtering options p2 350e746 - ğŸŒŸ feat: Added keyboard shortcuts for Match Case, Any Match in CardSearch f2df957 - ğŸŒŸ feat: Added more advanced card filtering options - added missing code 2930d85 - ğŸ fix: Fixed bug when filtering - drop card onto List Header causing error in some cases 4871750 - ğŸ fix: Fixed bug preventing board import after fixing projectManager without boardMembership 49ffba4 - ğŸŒŸ feat: Updated Getting Started Project with more visible Github link 8619605 - ğŸŒŸ feat: Moved UserPreferences to separate db table and model 14add6c - ğŸ fix: Updated regex for user-prefs id 70676ac - ğŸ fix: Standarized api route for user-projects f2351e9 - ğŸ fix: Fixed 4ga Boards import - projectManager showing after reload in some cases 729018c - ğŸ’¢ [PATCH] ci: Added issue templates a189282

Install this release using: docker pull ghcr.io/rargames/4gaboards:3.1.9
